Reviews.Title: “Bums On seats Tours Adelaide Australia”
Reviews.Author: BumsOnSeatsTours
Reviews.Content: Bums On Seats Tours Has a distinctive style of travel that offers something different to your ordinary guided tour or package holiday. Now in our 19th year of discovery, we have the knowledge and experience to share with you the old favourites and a few of our secret spots you wont find on a map. But even after almost 19 years, the mystery of the open road beckons as strong as ever. Staying true to our mantra of "fun, freedom & flexibility", you never know what youll find around the corner. Inviting the unknown, welcoming the unexpected and creating the unimaginable is what Bums On Seats Tours is all about. Why NOT Join us?

Reviews.Title: “Super Bowl Trip”
Reviews.Author: pickymomboston
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights during Super Bowl weekend. Although the rate was more than three times what it would normally be, the hotel was not out of line with what other places were charging. The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. The sales manager Dennis was very helpful and welcoming as well. Although a taxi was 40$ into downtown, the hotel staff always helped with calling a car and securing it. The rooms were average in size but very clean. Beds were super comfortable and the entire hotel was spotless. Complimentary full breakfast in the morning was very well done.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Sailguy
Reviews.Content: my wife and I stayed here after taking in the IU football game in Bloomington--we're from Chicago and didn't feel like driving back up that night. Property is definitely newer, right off 465, nice lobby, tons of parking, Fountain at the main entrance was a nice touch too. Staff was very friendly. Room was good sized, flat screen TV, had a king and mattress and comforter/pillows were excellent. Fridge in room too along with microwave. Got to the pool and it was heated. Hot tub was great. Suburban hotel so pool was nice sized as was the adjacent gym--all super clean. Precor equipment in the gym so definitely nice. Didn't try the bar but did do room service. Fast, person was friendly and food was reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “Nicely Updated”
Reviews.Author: MocNJen
Reviews.Content: Location looks like it has recently been updated. Has a slightly contemporary ambiance both in the lobby and the rooms. Plenty of parking, easy access to the highway and the staff was very friendly. I would certainly stay at this location again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel - Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: CORedTraveler
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff (front desk, housekeeping and restaurant). Rooms are clean and big. Fridge and microwave are included. There is a small pantry area to purchase food, drinks and snack.

Reviews.Title: “Very Comfortable and Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: LesleyLane
Reviews.Content: The hotel seemed very new. The rooms were spacious and had very nice furnishings. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was good sized. The bartender was very personable and fun to chat with. The food is very good. My only complaint is the housekeeping. My floor was not vacuumed at least one of the days. The night stands were not wiped down. The sheets were not changed even though I left the card on the bed. If the housekeeping had been up to par, I would have given a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: “Room left unlocked by housekeeping!”
Reviews.Author: NapaWineLover
Reviews.Content: The HGI is a pretty nice hotel - decent breakfast, clean and comfortable. I was all set to give them 3 or 4 stars right up until I came back from work last night to find that the maid had left my door propped open with the security bar! There was nothing of value in the room and nothing was missing but it easily could have been. Fortunately the room was at the end of the hall so not much foot traffic would have seen it open. I called the desk to complain and they told me they would "get back to me" - nobody did so I complained again this morning and was given a free breakfast coupon for my trouble. I'm not very picky when it comes to hotels but I definitely expect my door to be kept locked!

Reviews.Title: “A great stay close to Indy downtown without the price!”
Reviews.Author: MSUmindy
Reviews.Content: This is an almost new property. Very quiet, yet close to highways. Spacious, immaculate rooms, full amenities, great staff. Drive 15 minutes and you are downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: Keeblerelf928
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for 6 nights on business. The room was comfortable and the bed was awesome (not to mention the big HD tv to watch the baseball games on) Room service was great and I never had a problem with the food. One night it took forever to get the food and then the order was wrong, which was annoying but they brought up the right order within about 20 minutes. Breakfast buffet was good and had lots of options though the fruit is set up in such away it is really hard to get the fruit in the back if you are short, which I am. It was a relatively quiet hotel, though I was there during the FFA event and there were a ton of kids I only heard noises every so often. Overall I had a great stay at the hotel and was thankful I had such a nice place to go back to after long days in the office.

Reviews.Title: “What a great dinner”
Reviews.Author: indyconnie
Reviews.Content: I hosted a dinner at this hotel this week that we so delicious and perfect - I had to write my first ever review. My guests raved about the menu, the food, the decorations, the service and the ambiance of the hotel. The hotel is beautifully decorated. Our banquet room looked out over a nice patio with outdoor couches and a fire pit. I would highly recommend this hotel for a wonderful banquet dinner.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for business traveler.”
Reviews.Author: StLouie987
Reviews.Content: Hotel seemed very new. Good fitness room and pool. Very clean. Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. Wi-Fi worked great. The ideal hotel for business.

Reviews.Title: “Adjust.Sleep System Beds!!!!”
Reviews.Author: BLITZMA
Reviews.Content: There were many hotels to choose from, so I chose this one because of the low price, the proximity to family and to try the Adjust.Sleep System Bed. All in all the hotel was fine. PLUSES: free Wi-Fi, easy parking, gym, pool, business center MINUSES: poor lighting and not able to keep bathroom door ajar (as a night light). The Adjust.Sleep System Bed is purely a gimic (so not a plus). All things being the same, I would come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: dnrdavies
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on our way home from a trip. Usually stay at Hampton Inns because of the value but this was way less(76.00) than the Hampton at the same exit. Room was large and beds were nice. TV was huge and HD. Area was nice and upscale. Staff was friendly at check in.

HotelInfo.Name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis Northwest
HotelInfo.Address: 6930 Intech Blvd, Indianapolis, IN 46278
